faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.description: Do you have any questions? Browse here first and see how things work.

1.) How do I use a boat?.text:
You will need the **Grimlite Rev**. application to run boats. You can download the application from our portal site, https://auqw.tk/, instructions to do so are in <#811305082002866233> if you need any help. Once you do that, simply download a boat and load it.

> Bo(a)t -> Misc -> Load Boat [ NOT Load Boat (command) ]
How to load a boat:

2.) How do I edit something in a bot?.text: Double click the line you want to edit, and change whatever you want to change. If you want to make a mass edit, just open the .gbot file with Notepad (from its folder), and use a quick Find+Replace.

3.) I downloaded a bot and it isn't load.text: If you downloaded a bot and tried loading it, but nothing happened once you loaded the .gbot file, chances are, you're on an outdated version of Grimoire. Download **Grimlite Rev** from <#811305082002866233> and try again. If it still doesn't work, head over to #boating-help-chat and describe your issue in detail.

4.) My screen became black when I starte.text:
If a boat turns black, chances are, it has the lag killer feature enabled, which reduces lag significantly. Don't worry, the boat is still running in the background, this is just done to increase farming efficiency by killing lag.

> To turn it off while the bot is running:
> Boat -> Options -> Untick Lag Killer
> To turn it off while the bot is not running:
> Boat -> Options -> Untick Lag Killer -> Tick Enable Options Without Starting Boat

It is highly recommended to leave it on whilst boating, as it enhances the speed of the boat.

5.) My name got changed when I started t.text: It is Client Sided meaning you can only see it

6.) My boat doesn't seem to be working p.text: If the bot you downloaded isn't doing what you think it should be doing, check its instruction manual if applicable. Also reference the wiki and try to find out what it's doing. If neither of these work (or there's simply too much to look up on the wiki), feel free to ask in #boating-help-chat.

7.) My boat keeps disconnecting..text:
Most good bots will have a `Set Bot Delay: <number>` command at the top. If it's `Set Bot Delay: 0`, delete it, and add a `Set Bot Delay: 10` command in its place.
> Boat -> Misc -> Boat Delay -> Type in 10 -> Set Boat Delay
If it's another number, double click the command and increase that number by 5 or 10. 

Increasing the Boat Delay will make the boat very slightly slower, but will also prevent disconnections from occurring as frequently, so keep increasing the Boat Delay by 5 or 10 until you hit that sweet spot where you stop disconnecting. This usually happens at 10 for most people, but some have to go up to 25.

8.) My boat isn't relogging..text:
Is your account not relogging?
Check if you changed the details to a previously saved account 
If you had a previously saved account, put your new details in, press log in then reload your Grimoire.
If you do not reload Grimoire your username will be Null meaning it will not relog.

9.) Why is this item not dropping? What.text:
Oftentimes when this question is asked, the item has a high drop rate, however, certain external factors prevent it from dropping. In order to remedy this, use any or all of the following golden rules:

 **1)** Log out and log back in.
**2)** Change your server, preferably to a less popular one like Twig or Twilly.
**3)** Change your map, preferably to a private room if you're in a public room.
**4)** Clear your browser cache. A cluttered cache may prevent items from dropping.
**5)** Change your game. This one works the best. Trust me.

10.) Why is my \"_pro\" boat using Potio.text: The skillsets used by the _pro boats have a provision for potions should you need them for a certain grind. The same boats often use potions such as Felicitous Philtre to greatly increase soloing speed or Potion of Evasion to allow you to consistently solo hard hitting monsters wherever applicable and also, feasible. You won't get kicked or banned for spamming Skill 5: Potions because the game treats it as a player spamming potions despite not having them; the error warning is just there to alert players that using Skill 5 does nothing when a potion is not equipped. Please do not remove Skill 5: Potions on these boats or you will mess up its flow and cause bugs. Just leave it as it is.

11.) What is the shop id for <insert sho.text:
First, wiki the shop and find out whether it comes from the game menu or not.

**If it does:** Nice, try loading it and hope you don't get banned.

**If it does not:** then find out which map it is in. Then ask yourself can I join this map?

**If you can join the map:** Then nice, join that map and load the shop. YOU HAVE TO JOIN THE SAME MAP A SHOP IS IN FOR IT TO LOAD!!!

**If you can't join the map for any reason:** Then don't bother loading it cause it won't load.

12.) <insert item name here> hasn't drop.text:
It'll drop. The drop rate scales with the amount of complaining.

||Unless you forgot to whitelist it <:KekU:804648765612228648>||

grimfix.title: How to fix Grimoire.
grimfix.description: Does your grim have problems? Browse here and see common fixes.

1.) Grimoire not opening Fix.text:
🔹**Description**: Windows update killed flash player.
🔹**Symptoms**: Grimoire is not opening and stays on the system tray.
🔹**Solution**: Download and Install the latest [CleanFlash](https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1cc-muDonwOz5i8QAKY8xg5W_eXLiQsad).

2.) Grimoire stuck at connecting..text:
🔹**Solution**: 
1.) Type `%AppData%` on your windows search menu to open `Roaming` Folder.
2.) Find the folder `Macromedia` inside Roaming and delete it.
3.) Restart Grimoire.

3.) Grim shitty UI fix.text:
🔹**Description**: Grim looks like shit.
🔹**Symptoms**: Grimoire is randomly changing resolution and size.
🔹**Solution**: 

1.) Right click Grimoire.exe and click properties.
2.) On compatibility, click the "Change high DPI settings"
3.) Check "Overide high DPI scaling behavior" and select "System (Enhanced)"
4.) Click Ok. Run Grimoire.

4.) Null Username fix.text:
🔹**Description**: This occurs due to opening more than 2 instance of grim and playing using different characters.
🔹**Symptoms**: "Your Username is currently null meaning..." pop-up will appear.
🔹**Solution**: Restart current grim instance twice.

5.) Corrupted System files fix.text:
🔹**Description**: 
Did everything else and nothing worked? Perhaps some system fils are corrupted. Try this.

🔹**Solution**: 
1.) Open `CMD` in `administrator mode`.
2.) Type `sfc /scannow`
3.) Wait for it to finish.
4.) Once done, **open Grimoire**, test and see if things are fixed. If not **restart your PC** and then open Grimoire.

6.) Clear Local Storage.text:
1.) Open grimoire and right click on it.
2.) Click on Global Setting.
3.) On the Storage tab, click "Delete All"
4.) On the Advanced tab, click "Delete All"

7.) Grimoire Blocked Fix.text:
🔹**Description**: Your firewall or anti virus might be blocking grimoire.
🔹**Solution**: Try the followng:

1.) Allow the .exe file in firewall by going to Windows Firewall with advanced security. Then add new outbound rule with port 5588, and allow it.

2.) Add exception for the grimoire folder in your Antivirus.

3.) Unblock grimoire by right clicking grimoire.exe -> properties -> click unblock.

getgrim.title: How to Find Boats.
getgrim.description:
Looking for AQW Boats or the Latest Grim? Look no further. Visit our portal site where we distribute the Grimoire application and various boats for it.

**📕 Download Boats and Client here**: https://auqw.tk/

📌 1. Download & Install Grimlite.text:
-> Get `Grimlite Rev` from the portal. 
 -> Extract with winrar/winzip to empty folder.
-> Run `Grimoire.exe`.

📌 1.2. How to Extract rar files..text:
-> If you already know how to extract a file, skip this step.
-> To extract a file, you will need the WinRAR or the 7zip application
> WinRAR Download Link: [Click here](https://www.win-rar.com/postdownload.html?&L=0)
> 7zip Download Links: [Click here](https://www.7-zip.org/download.html)
> Download whichever one you want.

-> Find the `.rar` file in your Downloads folder.
-> Double click to open it with WinRAR/7zip.
-> Right click `..` and select Extract to a specified folder.
-> Select a new empty folder on your computer and click Ok.

📌 2. How to run Bots.text:
-> Open Grimoire.exe.
> If it's not opening, you may have to unblock it.
> Right Click Grimoire.exe -> Properties -> Unblock -> Apply.

-> To install a boat
> Open Grimlite\Grimoire folder, place the boats on the `Bots` folder.

-> To run a boat;
> On Grimoire toolbar -> Bot -> Manager -> On `Bots` tab -> Choose whichever bot you just installed.

📌 3. Things to Remember.text:
-> For now, many Boats on the portal may work on Grimoire 3.8+ PRO v1.7.8., but we will start making Boats for GrimLite only so get that.
-> If your bot isn't loading, it's because you're using an outdated version of Grimoire.

📌 Credits.text:
-> Biney for creating the original Grimoire
-> EmperorArts for Updating Grimoire
 -> Satan for revamping Grimoire 3.8 to Grimoire 3.8+ PRO up until v1.7.7
-> Rodit for creating a Flash EoL patch in v1.7.8. and for RBot
-> 133Spider for creating AQlite
-> Satan and Cat for creating GrimLite

askhelp.content:
1. Don't ask basic questions that can be looked up on the [wikidot](http://aqwwiki.wikidot.com/)

(Google aqw <item name> if wiki search is hard to use).

2. Mention your problem in detail, including the name of the boat you downloaded as well as the name of the person who made the boat.

3. Don't ask "Can I ask a question?", just ask the question directly for faster answers. This server is intended for asking questions.

4. Provide a screenshot using snipping tool or go on the screen sharing voice chat to show us what problems you're facing if needed.

Pearl Harbor Ports.description: We also have other platforms, or should we say, Harbor Ports! Make sure to join at least one of them to stay in touch with the server should you ever get kicked for inactivity or this server gets nuked to the Shadow Realm.

Welcome.description:
Welcome to __**Pearl Harbor** -The AQW Sailor's Paradise__! We are here to help you sail the Imbalanced and Nightmarish Landscape that is, AutisticQuest Worlds!  We will help you come out on top like the enjoying human you are supposed to be! 

The following below are our Channel Guides. Please do read them carefully. :)

AQW / AQ3D - The Wiki Team.description: Hey all, ever wanted to contribute to the ever-growing AQW Wiki? This server was created for wiki editors to use as a form of communication between themselves and any non wiki editors and/or new wiki editors looking for assistance. Feel free to join if you wish to help out!

Skidson Mafia - The best AQW private ser.description:
Skidson is an online AQW private server we're partnered with that has several experienced staff members, 800+ quests for you to play through, and over 9000+ items for you to collect! Come over to our server and find people to play with, and talk about your discoveries in-game! 

Website Link: https://skidson.online/
Server Link: https://discord.gg/Dsg9BsKJXH

How to Find Boats..description:
Looking for AQW Boats or the Latest Grim? Look no further. Visit our portal site where we distribute the Grimoire application and various boats for it.

**📕 Download Boats here**: https://auqw.tk/
**📕 Download GrimLite**: [Grimlite_Updater.rar](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/838377515252842496/838388190221041664/GrimLite_Updater.rar)
​

embed_list.📌 1. Download GrimLite:
-> Click the download link above to get `GrimLite_Updater.rar` then use winrar/winzip to extract it to your PC.
-> Create empty folder and place `updater.exe` on it.
-> Run `updater.exe` and it will download the latest GrimLite for you.
-> Wait for download to finish.
-> Run `Grimoire.exe`.
​
embed_list.📌 1.1. How to Extract Updater.exe:
-> If you already know how to extract a file, skip this step.
-> To extract a file, you will need the WinRAR or the 7zip application
> WinRAR Download Link: [Click here](https://www.win-rar.com/postdownload.html?&L=0)
> 7zip Download Links: [Click here](https://www.7-zip.org/download.html)
> Download whichever one you want.

-> Find the updater.rar in your Downloads folder.
-> Double click to open it with WinRAR/7zip.
-> Right click `..` and select Extract to a specified folder.-> Select a new empty folder on your computer and click Ok.
​
embed_list.📌 2. Using Grimoire:
-> Open the folder where you installed updater.exe
-> Open Grimoire.exe.
> If it's not opening, you may have to unblock it.
> Right Click Grimoire.exe -> Properties -> Unblock -> Apply.

-> You can now download boats from our website https://auqw.tk/. 
-> To run a boat;
> Open Grimoire.exe -> Bot -> Misc -> Load Bot -> Select whichever bot you just downloaded from your Downloads folder.
​
embed_list.📌 3. Things to Remember:
-> For now, many Boats on the portal may work on Grimoire 3.8+ PRO v1.7.8., but we will start making Boats for GrimLite only so get that.
-> If your bot isn't loading, it's because you're using an outdated version of Grimoire.
​

-> Rodit for creating a Flash EoL patch in v1.7.8. and for RBot
-> 133Spider for creating AQlite
-> Satan and Cat for creating GrimLite

Welcome!.description: Welcome to Pearl Harbor, the AQW Sailor's Paradise, a place that provides you with the best boats to sail your way through the hardest grinds in AQW!

embed_list.📌 1.) Visit the following channels befor:
<#811305082002866233> - Instructions to download bots and Grimlite.
<#817998750697521183> - Fixes to common problems with GrimLite Application.
<#820934479677358080> - So you don't have to waste time asking them.
embed_list.📌 2.) No stealing, griefing, or e-beggin: Do not steal bots from our portal site and upload them on your own platforms, attempt to troll or raid the server, or beg people for money or gifts. People have tried and it's never ended well.
embed_list.📌 3.) Do not post stupid content:
This includes malware and trojans, scam or phishing links, bot files, child pornography, animal pornography, grotesque imagery, hard non-medical non-surgical gore, videos depicting sexual assault, videos promoting anti-vaccination, erotic live-action role-playing, degenerative fursuiting, social justice warrior ranting, kinky femboytoys~, and fatties.
​
embed_list.Access: To access the rest of the server, simply react to this message with the ✅ emote.
